<div style="width=80%;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;">
<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset builds on global soil moisture dataset of ESA's Climate Change Initiative (CCI), providing simple metrics on its temporal variability on a per-pixel basis. 
</p>

<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Subdatasets</h3>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border: none;box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px #f8f8f8;'>
<summary style="font-size: 16px;">`moistureMean` | Soil moisture historical mean (m3/m3)</summary>
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
|value_range|e.g. 0...1|
</details>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border: none;box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px #f8f8f8;'>
<summary style="font-size: 16px;">`moistureMin` | Soil moisture historical min (m3/m3)</summary>
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
|value_range|e.g. 0...1|
</details>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border: none;box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px #f8f8f8;'>
<summary style="font-size: 16px;">`moistureMax` | Soil moisture historical max (m3/m3)</summary>
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
|value_range|e.g. 0...1|
</details>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border: none;box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px #f8f8f8;'>
<summary style="font-size: 16px;">`moistureAmplitude` | Soil moisture historical amplitude (m3/m3)</summary>
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
|value_range|e.g. 0...1|
</details>
<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">masDMT query</h3>
<div style="width=80%;margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;background-color:#777777;">
```{r eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
# data call without specifying subdataset and resolution
list_data("CCI_SM")

# data call for specific subdataset 
list_data("CCI_SM/moistureMean")

# data call to subdataset with a specific resolution
list_data("CCI_SM/moistureMean/25km")
```
</div>
